title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404 response.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404 response.
SR: To reproduce this issue:1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed3. Access any URL on the Tomcat instance4. Observe that it returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404 response.
